materials.name: Spiral Background

widgets.name: Label_2
widgets.text:
Press ' Space' to fly the derpo bird
but watch out for the spike!

widgets.animation:
$OnOpen
move 350.0 500
duration 1.0
interpolation EaseOutBounce

$OnClick
move -150.0 500.0
duration 0.5
interpolation EaseInBack
widgets.name: play

widgets.animation:
$OnOpen
move 550.5 500.5
duration 1.0
interpolation EaseOutBounce

$OnClick
move 1050.0 500.0
duration 0.5
interpolation EaseInBack
widgets.name: quit
